be.ac.ulg.montefiore.run.jadti
Class Node

java.lang.Object
  be.ac.ulg.montefiore.run.jadti.Node
Direct Known Subclasses:
LeafNode, OpenNode, TestNode
public abstract class Node
extends java.lang.Object

A decision tree node.

Field Detail

weight

public final double weight
Constructor Detail

Node

public Node(double weight)
Creates a new node independant of any tree.

Parameters:
weight - A number representing the weight of this node. This should be the number of items in the learning set matching this node.
Method Detail

getFather

public Node getFather()
Returns the node's father.

Returns:
The node's father.

setFather

protected void setFather(Node father)
Sets a new father for this node.

Parameters:
father - The new node's father.

isRoot

public boolean isRoot()
Checks if this node is the tree root.

Returns:
true iff this node is the tree root.

replace

public void replace(Node node)
Replace this node with another one. This node father becomes null.

Parameters:
node - The new node replacing this one.

openNode

public OpenNode openNode()
Returns the leftmost open node of the subtree defined by this object. Leftmost means that the son number chosen at each test node while descending the tree is the smallest.

Returns:
The leftmost open node in the descendants of this node, or null if no descendant is an open node.

hasOpenNode

public abstract boolean hasOpenNode()
Shows if one of the descendants of this node is open. More formally, this function returns true iff this node is open or there exist one son of this node 's' such that s.hasOpenNode() == true.

Returns:
true iff one of the descendants of this node is open.

replaceSon

protected abstract void replaceSon(Node oldSon,
                                   Node newSon)
Replace a son with a new node. The new and old nodes do not need to be modified, i.e. their father reference have already been updated.

Parameters:
oldSon - The son to be replaced.
newSon - The replacing node. This argument cannot be null.

updateHasOpenNode

protected abstract void updateHasOpenNode()
Checks if the return value of hasOpenNode() could have change. If yes, calls father.updateHasOpenNode().

nbSons

public abstract int nbSons()
Returns the number of sons of this node.

Returns:
This node's number of sons.

son

public abstract Node son(int sonNb)
Returns a son of this node. Sons are described by a number such that 0 <= sonNb < nbSons().

Returns:
This node's number of sons.

isLeaf

public boolean isLeaf()
Checks if this node is a leaf node. A node is a leaf node iff it has no sons.

Returns:
true iff this node is a leaf node.

tree

public DecisionTree tree()
Returns the tree associated to this node. Notice that this requires to find the root of the tree, an operation with complexity log(nbNodes) on average.

Returns:
The node's tree, or null if the node is not associated to a tree.
